name: Sàngshī Wéichéng: Límíng
summary: Prepare for the apocalypse in Sàngshī Wéichéng: Límíng, a thrilling blend of American comic style, strategic gameplay, and collectible card battling. Build your ultimate team from a diverse roster of heroes and villains, mastering their unique abilities to overcome challenging encounters and save the world from impending doom. Immerse yourself in a vibrant post-apocalyptic setting where every decision matters.
